message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60%, you take 40%.  It's in your best interest to settle early due to the inflation.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor, Alice. Let's meet closer to the middle.
I understand you want a more even split, Bob, but the inflation is hitting you harder.  This offer ensures you lose less value in the long run.
Alice, we're not making progress. I'm willing to be slightly flexible, but this needs to be more equitable. Time is literally money for me with this inflation!
